name: Physics Playground (New_Unity_Gamedev)
description:
This game is a physics playground, ever wanted to become spiderman or maybe shoot ragdolls then this game is for you. 

CONTROLS:

  • E to equip GUN
  • E to de equip GUN
  • Q to equip grappling GUN
  • Q to de equip grappling GUN
  • W, SPACE or UPARROW to jump
  • A D or left and right arrow keys to move
  • Left mouse to shoot
  • R to become a ragdoll!

Have fun!

MADE BY: NEW_UNITY_GAMEDEV
